title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Meet the classic pencil that sets the standard. Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count deliver smooth, reliable writing from the very first stroke—no sharpener needed.

Why you’ll love them:
- Silky, consistent lines: Exclusive #2 graphite with a thick core glides for clean, dark marks ideal for tests, notes, and sketches.
- Premium wood, responsibly sourced: Durable barrels sharpen easily and resist breakage.
- Iconic look, comfortable feel: Golden yellow matte lacquer for a non-slip grip, finished with the signature green-and-gold ferrule.
- Erases cleanly: Latex-free eraser lifts mistakes without smudging or tearing paper.
- Classroom trusted, parent approved: PMA certified non-toxic and preferred by teachers.
- Time-tested quality: Crafted with over 100 years of Ticonderoga tradition.

Stock up with the 30-count pack for home, school, and office. Dependable, comfortable, and unmistakably Ticonderoga—your everyday writing just got better.
